Start at : Set start Go to Stop at : Set stop Position : Duration : Try quote Stop Validate positions Options Button preview Fade out 1 second before end Set name Create quote Creating… Downloading…\n(This might take a while) Extracting… Cutting… Cleaning… Adding to list… Source videon

Title : %s
Author : %s
Date : %s

Watch Appearance Delete Save Close OK Cancel Yes No Delete quote ? Do you really want to delete the quote \'%s\' ? About QuoteTube Version : %s\n Developer : Klemek\n Icons : FontAwesome\n Libs : \n -GeometricProgressView (Bohush)\n -FFmpegAndroid (Writingminds)\n -Colorpicker (Jrummyapps)\n -Material-dialogs (Afollestad)\n -Picasso (Squareup)\n Update available A new update is available, do you want to update now ? Don\'t show again Welcome to QuoteTube ! QuoteTube is a simple soundbox app where you can extract a part of any Youtube video and play \"quotes\" (the extracted sound) indefinitely without Internet. Have fun ! Thanks QuoteTube Beta 1.5 Thank you for updating QuoteTube !\n\n Changelog :\n - Slightly changed colors\n - Suggestions in youtube searching - French translation - Multiline on quote name - Welcome and update messages\n - Some fixes\n QPython 1.2.5 not installed In order to run this app you must install a specific version of QPython that will be downloaded now. Ok, do it ! Not connected You need to be connected to the Internet to finish installing You need to be connected to the Internet to download the sound FFmpeg failed loading Your device does not support FFmpeg, you will not be able to create new quotes. Youtube-dl installation failed Please check the following:\n -You are connected to the Internet.\n -You have enough space on your device. The quote length must be less than %.1f s Please set a name to your quote Error Error %d : \n%s You have another version of QPython, please uninstall it in order to use this app. (We need the version 1.2.5 that will be downloaded after) Wrong version of QPython Never ! Unexpected error An unexpected error has occured : %s Storage permission denied QuoteTube need storage permission to store the quotes and execute Python scripts. Are you sure you want to deny this permission ? QuoteTube need storage permission to store the quotes and execute python scripts. Pease go to your settings to change it. Re-Try I\'m sure No video linked to this quote QuoteTube title Quote image Quote icon Channel thumbnail Video thumbnail
